description:
Kaoru and Mayu are playing card games in her room, and the girl insists on sharing her bed with the boy. Kaoru suddenly recognizes her huge stuffed rabbit and remembers the days when they first met four years ago.
At home, Kaoru wants to explain everything to Aoi. But before he gets a chance to do it, a drunk Tina wants him to kiss her, like he kissed that other girl... right in front of Aoi, who pretends not to listen but leaves the room.
